name: Moai Capital Venture
overview:
We are seed-stage European investors, often providing a companyâ€™s first outside capital, and are not afraid of investing in pre-revenue companies. We look to take an active role in most of the companies we invest in, because we believe our insight and expertise are far more valuable than our capital.

Sector of investiment:

Real Time Media, Social E-commerce, Vertical E-marketplace, Gaming, Gambling and Skill Game, Software as a service, Cloud Computing, Mobile e Geo Advertising.

Moai capital fills the startup funding gap by providing just enough capital to get your idea off the ground. Your new company could receive money from 50,000 to 250.000 euro in seed funding.

Almost nothing is too early. Weâ€™ve accepted companies with no more than an idea, a dream, and maybe a dog. One of the great things about Moai Capital is that we help you refine your idea and business model.

Once we invest, weâ€™re motivated to help you succeed by introducing you to people who can help, assisting you with strategy, finding more investors, and generally helping you to succeed.

milestones.description: Moai Capital Group invests in Misshobby.com, an European handmade E-marketplace
Moai Capital Group invests in Iobloggo.com a news social and local blogging platform with 4.2 ml users
Moai Capital Group invests in Irisblog.it a european women blog network with 500.000 unic users
